|---Switchblade---Megatron---|

Switchblade finishes putting the panel back onto wall, and turns to 
Megatron. "Megs, the circuitry has been fixed, and sensors should be 
in full working order... well, if Perceptor didn't mess anything up 
that is."

Megatron smiles, his face hiding his irritated mood, "Excellent..." 
He turns to Perceptor, "Perceptor, head to the storage bay, grab 
some weapons, then take them to the engine room." His gaze switches 
to Switchblade, "Switchblade, head to the engine room, and determine 
the extend of the damage." Megatron frowned <I have a feeling the 
engines are gone...> and he continued, "If the engines are not 
repairable, then scrap them, and use the parts to make a base 
defense system for us. We're sitting ducks at the moment."

Switchblade nods as he starts to go to the engine room. As he passes 
Perceptor he mumbles something quietly, "Idiot bots like Perceptor 
should be reprogrammed for the greater good of Megatron... or 
Switchblade."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> Perceptor looked to Swichblade and spoke  with a despective 
> tone "Have you ended, Swichblade?"
